page.title: 16SPETISBURY'S POLICEMAN- (1)
page.content: The local village policeman lives in a Police house in Spetisbury,but is based at Blandford Police Station. He drives his own motor bike to Blandford to start work and pick up his police vehicle. The Blandford area is divided into two rural "patches". He covers the "south patch" in a rural police van. As well as patrolling the whole south area,he personally looks after ten villages, and residents can expect to see him regularly to deal with any queries they have. He has a system of three duties: 8.3Oa.m.-4.3Op.m. 6.OOp.m.-2.OOa.m. and occasionally he works all night - 1O.OOp.m.-6.OOa.m.
